sentences.en: A network of railways has spread over the province.
Arvo avoided committing himself. "I'm afraid that's not my province," he replied.
sentences.cn: 阿尔沃不想作出承诺，“恐怕那不归我管，”他回答说。

sentences.en: Beset by ethnic strife, the province remains ungovernable.
sentences.cn: 该省因受种族冲突困扰而失控。

sentences.en: Changzhou is under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province.
Computers were once the exclusive province of scientists and mathematicians.
sentences.cn: 计算机一度为科学家和数学家专用。

sentences.en: Most of those who left the province to work abroad were unskilled.
sentences.cn: 那些离开该省出国打工的人大部分都未经专门训练。

sentences.en: Originally the old man lived in Shandong Province.
sentences.cn: 这位老人原本住在山东.

sentences.en: Shandong province is famous for its abundant agricultural resources.
sentences.cn: 山东省以其丰富的农业资源而闻名遐迩.

sentences.en: Tattooing is not just the province of sailors.
sentences.cn: 纹身不只是水手们才感兴趣的事。

sentences.en: That kind of work is not in my province.
sentences.cn: 那种工作我可承担不了.

sentences.en: The arrangement of light industry in the province needs adjustment.
sentences.cn: 那个省的轻工业布局需要调整.

sentences.en: The economy of the province was atypical because it was particularly small.
sentences.cn: 该省的经济比较特殊，因为它的规模特别小。

sentences.en: The majority of people in the province are in favour of devolution.
sentences.cn: 该省大多数人赞成权力下放.

sentences.en: There are countless small ski areas dotted about the province.
sentences.cn: 该省内遍布着许多小型滑雪场。

sentences.en: This region is within the Province of Liaoning.
This university is directly under the Province.
Yunnan province is the home of elephants and peacocks.
sentences.cn: 云南是大象和孔雀的生息地.

trans.tran_cn: 省，首都以外的地区，范围
trans.tran_en: one of the large areas into which some countries are divided, and which usually has its own local government
